title: Plunder Panic
notes: SteamDB shows 87.40% positive (1,873 reviews); Steam page shows positive sentiment. Score reflects strong consensus.
raw_comment: 2 teams of pirates face off for supremacy on the high seas. Multiple ways to win. Up to 12 local players. Online multiplayer supported. 12 PS4. 🎮 12 XBox. ⌨ 1 on keyboard. 🖥️ Shared screen.
